item.title: Brazilian ICPC Summer School 2018
item.description: This is a two weeks long event, with theoretic lectures from outstanding instructors in the mornings, and competitive programming contests in the afternoons. It was held from January 22nd to February 3rd in the city of Campinas, SÃ£o Paulo.
